summary.summary: Speaker A hosted a meeting to discuss issues with embedding in their AI course. They replaced all embedding with open embedding and chunking is done. Embedding is now being done through open embedding, as some embeddings are not working better due to updates. The vector database retriever tool and everything are connected to the worker. When Speaker A gives a mail to the first worker, it will summarize and then pass it to the second worker (Email Responder) for reading the content in the same style as Speaker A's mail and following the same format to write a mail until finally saving it.
